item.Q:
Write the character:
1: surname Chen; Chen of the Southern dynasties (557-589)
2: arrange; exhibit; narrate; tell; old; stale; to state; to display; to explain
item.A:
陈 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 陳
1: Chén 2: chén
陈毅 (陳毅) Chényì Chen Yi, former mayor of Shanghai and highest ranking military commander in China 陈毅 (陳毅) Chényì Chen Yi, former mayor of Shanghai and highest ranking military commander in China

item.Q:
Write the character:
to announce; to inform; report; newspaper; recompense; revenge
item.A:
traditional: 報
bào
报告 (報告) bàogào to inform; report; make known; speech; talk; lecture

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to convey; to forward (mail); to transfer; to turn; to shift
2: to revolve; to turn; to circle about; to walk about
item.A:
转 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 轉
1: zhuǎn 2: zhuàn
转动 (轉動) zhuǎndòng turn 转子 (轉子) zhuànzi rotor

party; association; club; society; surname Dang
item.A:

dǎng

zhuǎnér conversely; but rather; to turn and (address a topic, face attackers etc); to turn against sb; to turn one's thoughts back to; to come around (to a point of view)

traditional: 轉身
zhuǎnshēn (of a person) to turn round; to face about

yīwǔyīshí (narrate) systematically and in full detail; count by fives or tens
wǔyī 5-1 (May 1st)

wǔdài Five dynasties (in different contexts, from mythology through to Han and the interregnum between Han and Tang); the five dynasties forming the interregnum between Tang and Song (936-947) - namely Later Liang 后梁, Later Tang 后唐, Later Jin 后晋, Later Han 后汉, Later Zhou 后周

traditional: 五代十國
wǔdàishíguó Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms Period between Tang and Song (907-960)
wǔtái Wutai
wǔtáishān Wutai Mountain

Wǔcháng (N) Wuchang (city in Heilongjiang)
wǔcháng Wuchang
wǔxīng five star
wǔxíng five elements (in Chinese philosophy: earth, air, fire, metal and wood)
wǔyīn five notes of pentatonic scale, roughly do, re, mi, sol, la; five initial consonants of Chinese phonetics, namely 喉音, 牙音, 舌音, 齒音|齿音, 唇音
